network_ioc_objects.notes: Malicious URL used to deliver cryptojacking malware via compromised third-party JavaScript library. The URL was served from 'http://cryptominer.com/script.js' and was responsible for downloading the malware on our servers. The incident was detected on 2025-08-23.

timeline_objects.notes: Malware introduced via compromised third-party JavaScript library (http://cryptominer.com/script.js), causing sustained high CPU usage on production web servers. Security team confirmed cryptojacking activity on August 23, 2025.
